input: A light switch toggles between on and off states
output: states: off, on | transitions: off --toggle--> on, on --toggle--> off

input: A door lock toggles between locked and unlocked
output: states: locked, unlocked | transitions: locked --key--> unlocked, unlocked --key--> locked

input: A power button switches device on and off
output: states: off, on | transitions: off --press--> on, on --press--> off

input: A lamp switches between bright and dim modes
output: states: bright, dim | transitions: bright --adjust--> dim, dim --adjust--> bright

input: A traffic light switches from red to green to yellow in order
output: states: red, green, yellow | transitions: red -> green, green -> yellow, yellow -> red

input: A washing machine cycles through wash rinse and spin
output: states: idle, wash, rinse, spin | transitions: idle -> wash, wash -> rinse, rinse -> spin, spin -> idle

input: A dishwasher runs through pre-wash main wash rinse and dry cycles
output: states: idle, prewash, mainwash, rinse, dry | transitions: idle -> prewash, prewash -> mainwash, mainwash -> rinse, rinse -> dry, dry -> idle

input: A microwave starts heating stops when timer ends
output: states: idle, heating, complete | transitions: idle --start--> heating, heating --timer--> complete, complete -> idle

input: A fan has three speeds controlled by button
output: states: off, low, medium, high | transitions: off -> low, low -> medium, medium -> high, high -> off

input: A ceiling fan cycles through off low medium high speeds
output: states: off, low, medium, high | transitions: off -> low, low -> medium, medium -> high, high -> off

input: A blender operates at low medium and high speeds with off state
output: states: off, low, medium, high | transitions: off -> low, low -> medium, medium -> high, high -> off

input: An air conditioner has fan modes off low medium high
output: states: off, low, medium, high | transitions: off -> low, low -> medium, medium -> high, high -> off

input: A door bell rings when button is pressed
output: states: idle, ringing | transitions: idle --press--> ringing, ringing --timeout--> idle

input: A garage door opener toggles between closed and open
output: states: closed, opening, open, closing | transitions: closed --button--> opening, opening -> open, open --button--> closing, closing -> closed

input: An automatic door opens when sensor detects person
output: states: closed, open | transitions: closed --detect--> open, open --timeout--> closed

input: A gate opens when vehicle approaches and closes after passing
output: states: closed, open | transitions: closed --approach--> open, open --pass--> closed

input: An elevator moves between floors
output: states: floor1, floor2, floor3 | transitions: floor1 --up--> floor2, floor2 --up--> floor3, floor3 --down--> floor2, floor2 --down--> floor1

input: A lift operates between ground first and second floors
output: states: ground, first, second | transitions: ground --up--> first, first --up--> second, second --down--> first, first --down--> ground

input: An elevator services basement ground and upper floors
output: states: basement, ground, upper | transitions: basement --up--> ground, ground --up--> upper, upper --down--> ground, ground --down--> basement

input: A vending machine gives output after receiving 10 rupees
output: states: s0, s5, s10 | transitions: s0 --5rs--> s5, s5 --5rs--> s10, s10 --dispense--> s0

input: A coin slot accepts coins until 20 cents then dispenses
output: states: s0, s10, s20 | transitions: s0 --10c--> s10, s10 --10c--> s20, s20 --dispense--> s0

input: A ticket machine collects 50 rupees then prints ticket
A turnstile unlocks on token and locks again after passing
output: states: locked, unlocked | transitions: locked --token--> unlocked, unlocked --pass--> locked

input: A subway gate opens with ticket and closes after entry
output: states: closed, open | transitions: closed --ticket--> open, open --entry--> closed

input: A parking barrier lifts on payment and lowers after car passes
output: states: down, up | transitions: down --pay--> up, up --pass--> down

input: A music player cycles through stopped playing and paused states
output: states: stopped, playing, paused | transitions: stopped --play--> playing, playing --pause--> paused, paused --resume--> playing, playing --stop--> stopped

input: A video player has play pause and stop controls
output: states: stopped, playing, paused | transitions: stopped --play--> playing, playing --pause--> paused, paused --play--> playing, playing --stop--> stopped

input: A thermostat switches heating on when cold and off when warm
output: states: heateroff, heateron | transitions: heateroff --cold--> heateron, heateron --warm--> heateroff

input: A temperature controller activates cooling when hot
output: states: coolingoff, coolingon | transitions: coolingoff --hot--> coolingon, coolingon --cool--> coolingoff

input: An AC unit turns on at 25C and off at 20C
output: states: off, on | transitions: off --hot--> on, on --cool--> off

input: A battery charger indicates charging full and disconnected states
output: states: disconnected, charging, full | transitions: disconnected --plug--> charging, charging --complete--> full, full --unplug--> disconnected

input: A phone charging status shows not charging charging and charged
output: states: notcharging, charging, charged | transitions: notcharging --connect--> charging, charging --full--> charged, charged --disconnect--> notcharging

input: A burglar alarm is armed detects intrusion sounds alarm then resets
output: states: armed, intrusion, alarmsounding, reset | transitions: armed --detect--> intrusion, intrusion -> alarmsounding, alarmsounding --reset--> armed

input: A fire alarm monitors detects smoke triggers alarm and resets
output: states: monitoring, smokedetected, alarmtriggered | transitions: monitoring --smoke--> smokedetected, smokedetected -> alarmtriggered, alarmtriggered --reset--> monitoring

input: A motion sensor light turns on with movement and off after timeout
output: states: off, on | transitions: off --motion--> on, on --timeout--> off

input: A proximity sensor activates when object is near
output: states: inactive, active | transitions: inactive --detect--> active, active --clear--> inactive

input: A light sensor turns lights on at night and off during day
output: states: lightsoff, lightson | transitions: lightsoff --dark--> lightson, lightson --bright--> lightsoff

input: An ATM transitions from idle to card inserted to PIN entry to transaction
output: states: idle, cardinserted, pinentry, transaction | transitions: idle --insert--> cardinserted, cardinserted --enterpin--> pinentry, pinentry --correct--> transaction, transaction -> idle

input: A switch toggles between two states
output: states: state1, state2 | transitions: state1 --toggle--> state2, state2 --toggle--> state1

input: A button press changes system state
output: states: off, on | transitions: off --press--> on, on --press--> off

input: A coffee machine dispenses after coin insertion
output: states: idle, coininserted, dispensing | transitions: idle --coin--> coininserted, coininserted -> dispensing, dispensing -> idle

input: A toaster starts toasting on lever press and pops up when done
output: states: idle, toasting, popup | transitions: idle --press--> toasting, toasting --done--> popup, popup -> idle

input: A printer cycles through ready printing and out of paper states
output: states: ready, printing, outofpaper | transitions: ready --print--> printing, printing --nopaper--> outofpaper, outofpaper --refill--> ready

input: A computer boots up runs sleeps and shuts down
output: states: off, booting, running, sleep, shuttingdown | transitions: off -> booting, booting -> running, running --sleep--> sleep, sleep --wake--> running, running --shutdown--> shuttingdown, shuttingdown -> off
